body_html: I have the zip(d1, num_slices) dataset and I want to produce another dataset that slices each tensor in d1 into num_slices slices (segments of equal length). I posted a SO question - I know the code there is not correct (I should be using the dummy dataset) but still I am not sure the approach is at all possible.

body: I have the zip(d1, num_slices) dataset and I want to produce another dataset that slices each tensor in d1 into num_slices slices (segments of  equal length). I posted a [SO question](https://stackoverflow.com/q/46604371/281545) - I know the code there is not correct (I should be using the dummy dataset) but still I am not sure the approach is at all possible.
